scribe_response.raw_line: LEFT JOIN accounts a ON v.account_id = a.id
scribe_response.sql_line_for_commenting: LEFT JOIN accounts a ON visits_main.account_id = accounts.id
scribe_response.description:
This code is joining the visits table to the accounts table.
The left join means that we are only including rows from the visits table that have a corresponding row in the accounts table.
